Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "We, the Guild of Linguistics offer lessons to citizens who may wish to know a particular dialect or species.. for a small fee of course. We also translate texts if required, or translate for other people. We, as a guild also study all the languages in the city and aim to be the best around, even though we are the only linguistic guild in the city." \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "We, the Guild of Linguistics, offer lessons to citizens who may wish to know a particular dialect or species.. for a small fee of course. We also translate texts if required, or translate for other people. We, as a guild also study all the languages in the city and aim to be the best around, even though we are the only linguistic guild in the city.\\r\\n\\r\\nFor information on languages spoken, or to join. Contact Maena Boutin." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
(\{ (\{ 4, 1 \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Any new jobs shall be added to this page." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
(\{ (\{ 6, 1 \}), (\{ "members_list", "" \}), (\{ "ring_listing", "Nothing has been added to this page yet." \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
